product_name: Wilderness Systems Tempest 170 Kayak with Skeg
long_description: With a combination of solid initial stability and strong tracking in wind and current, this touring kayak is an excellent choice for midsize paddlers looking to explore rough-water coastlines.
short_description: With a combination of solid initial stability and strong tracking in wind and current, this touring kayak is an excellent choice for midsize paddlers looking to explore rough-water coastlines.
